PPLoc: Made available within client contracts and private websites; see link below.
activities:
Incentec Solutions, Inc. provides online incentive software tools and program management services worldwide.  Some of our incentive programs may have participants in the EU. 
Currently, Incentec collects information on-line from our Program Sites for use in incentive programs.  The data is collected directly from the the customer sponsoring the incentive program or from participants in the program or both.  The data is used for managing incentive and reward programs run by the Customer Sponsor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line data related to EU participants
